name: Crossing the Eastern Desert to the Lands of Mnar
name_original: Crossing the Eastern Desert to the Lands of Mnar
description:
As you cross the portal you see the alien landscape before you. The Easterd Desert lies beyond the ridge, and far away in the distance, you see the mountains bordering the Lands of Mnar and the fabled ruins of Sarnath.

You see the dust trail of Professor Ambroses henchmen, and decide to beat them to the Lands of Mnar.

Crossing the Eastern Desert to the Lands of Mnar was made for MyFirstGameJam: Summer Edition in 10 days.

Music by chasersgaming at opengameart.

Controls:

Move: Arrow keys

Shoot: X

Item: C

Mute sounds: M

Fullscreen: F

Restart: R

Quit: Escape
